summary: This is an email chain from March 2019 where an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York requests a copy of the search warrant affidavit and order for Jeffrey Epstein's residence from a colleague. The email indicates the search was executed by local authorities before the FBI became involved in the case.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: The sender of the email requesting the search warrant affidavit and order for Epstein's residence in connection with the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Email request for Epstein search warrant
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney emails a colleague requesting the search warrant affidavit and order for Jeffrey Epstein's residence, noting it was executed by local authorities before the FBI case.
personsInvolved: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York

keyFacts: A search warrant was executed at Jeffrey Epstein's residence by local authorities before the FBI became involved in the case.
The search warrant affidavit and order for Epstein's residence were being sought by federal prosecutors in March 2019.
The email correspondence shows coordination between law enforcement entities regarding the Epstein investigation materials.
